mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT, USERINFO_SEQ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.USERINFO_SEQ),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO A) )
mapper.select:
SELECT U.USERINFO_SEQ, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.EMAIL, U.ADDR1
FROM USER_INFO U ORDER BY U.USERINFO_SEQ
